subproject.corporate outcome: National and local governments and communities have the capacities to adapt to climate change and make inclusive and sustainable environment & energy decisions benefitting in particular under-served populations
subproject.description: The objective of Project BRA/03/009 is to promote the preservation of natural resources and sustainable development in the regions of the Amazon and Atlantic Forest and associated ecosystems, encouraging and supporting the initiatives of local communities and NGOs, as well as to enable the environmental management of Amerindian lands with sustainable projects in the social, cultural and economic areas designed and implemented by their own communities and organizations.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
subproject.title: BRA/03/009-DEMONSTRATIVE PROJE
